items.strItemDescription: Independence is recognized far and wide as the weapon representing freedom from unjust rule.
Infused with a burning spirit of liberty, this scythe was designed to rise beyond limitations, withstand injustices, and is ultimately the weapon for freedom.
Liberty is recognized all over world as the weapon symbolizing the power of free will for all people.
Freedom is recognized all over this region of Lore as a weapon symbolizing the equality of all people.
Independence is recognized far and wide as the weapon representing freedom from unjust rule.
Infused with a burning spirit of liberty, this scythe was designed to rise beyond limitations, withstand injustices, and is ultimately the weapon for freedom.
Liberty is recognized all over world as the weapon symbolizing the power of free will for all people.
Freedom is recognized all over this region of Lore as a weapon symbolizing the equality of all people.

Heroes all over Lore celebrate courage each time they pick up this dagger and sneak into range to attack their enemies. For courage and Lore, chaaaarge!
The flame of liberty burns brightly with this tribute to freedom and national pride!
A scythe worthy of the noble North, eh? Happy Canada Day!
Red, white or blue, click for your color! Happy Fourth of July!
The spirit of liberty flows through this fiery staff! Show off your patriotism!
The fury inside will always be there to help preserve your feelings!
Heroes all over Lore celebrate courage each time they pick up this staff and gather their inner fire needed to overcome adversity. For honor and Lore, chaaaarge!
Heroes all over Lore celebrate loyalty each time they pick up this sword and battle in wars and quests with each other. For loyalty and Lore, chaaaarge!
The flame of liberty burns brightly with this tribute to freedom and national pride!
